content: this crochet pattern is for an inclusive progressive pride flag it can be used at a wall hanging bunting or decorative item it was created specifically to support my lgbt+ community and i welcome allies to make it and fly it as well materials 4mm crochet hook 2 stitch markers yarn needle scissors worsted weight yarn in colors listed below yellow purple light pink light blue white brown black red orange green blue violet optional materials 1/8-inch x 12-inch wooden dowel wire cutter/diagonal cutting pliers 2- large hole beads glue blocking mat/board & t-pins handheld steamer pencil/pen
